ISSUE.TITLE: ConvertToPrimaryStoreCurrency bug
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Scenario: - Primary store currency is DKK - The primary exchange currency is EUR - The exchange rate for EUR is thus 1 and ~7.5 for DKK - I have an amount of money in EUR - I want to convert this amount to the primary store currency (DKK) ### Approach - I fetch the sourceCurrency (EUR) using the currency service - I convert the amount using ConvertToPrimaryStoreCurrency(amount, sourceCurrency) ### Expected result - I get the amount back converted to the primary store currency (DKK) from EUR ie. amount/~7.5 ### Actual result - I get the same amount back ie. if I got 40 EUR I get 40 "DKK" back, even though the rates are correct.
